motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • March 11, 2024 meeting minutes • March 12, 2024 special called meeting minutes • March 13, 2024 special called meeting minutes • Second read MMSP 24-01 for Kingswood Church major master sign plan

motions.title: Amendment to MMSP 24-02 Lighting Condition
motions.description: Amendment to add condition that lighting for building wall sign #3 facing Pernoshal Court will be turned off at 10:30 pm and turned back on at 5:30 am.

motions.title: MMSP 24-02 Emory Healthcare Sign Plan (Second Read)
motions.description: Second read approval of Major Master Sign Plan for 4553 N Shallowford Road - Emory Healthcare as amended with lighting condition.

motions.title: Additional LMIG Funds for 2024 Paving Contract
motions.description: Approval to apply additional Local Maintenance and Improvement Grant funds of $604,408.60 to the 2024 paving contract.

motions.title: Flock Safety Two Year Contract for PCID Area
motions.description: Approval of Flock Safety two year contract for license plate readers, surveillance cameras, and gunshot detection in PCID area, fully funded by PCIDs with no city obligation after two years.

motions.title: Contract with Sunbelt for Pedestrian Hybrid Beacons
motions.description: Award contract to Sunbelt Traffic, LLC for installation of pedestrian hybrid beacons on Perimeter Center West and North Peachtree Road in amount of $419,924 plus 10% contingency.
